rulings.text: If you control no creatures other than Joo Dee and no artifacts as the ability resolves, you'll need to sacrifice either Joo Dee or the token copy.
The sacrifice part of Joo Dee's ability happens as part of the resolution of the ability. Players cannot do anything between creating the copy and sacrificing an artifact or creature.

The token copies exactly what was printed on the original creature and nothing else (unless that creature is copying something else or is a token; see below). It doesn't copy whether that creature is tapped or untapped, whether it has any counters on it or Auras and Equipment attached to it, or any non-copy effects that have changed its power, toughness, types, color, or so on.

mainBoard.name: Hei Bai, Spirit of Balance

rulings.text: Hei Bai's last ability doesn't cause you to move counters from Hei Bai onto the target creature. Rather, you put the same number of each kind of counter Hei Bai had when he left the battlefield onto the target creature.
Hei Bai's last ability puts all counters that were on Hei Bai onto the target creature, not just his +1/+1 counters.
If Hei Bai has -1/-1 counters on him when he leaves the battlefield, that ability will include those as well. This may result in the recipient of the counters dying.

If enough -1/-1 counters are put on Hei Bai at the same time to make his toughness 0 or less, his last ability will see all of the +1/+1 counters he had when he left the battlefield as well as the -1/-1 counters he had, and an equal number of each of those types of counters (plus any other applicable counters) will be put onto the target creature.

In some cases, you may end up putting the appropriate counters on more than one permanent. For example, if you control a Buzzard-Wasp Colony when Hei Bai dies, you'll put the appropriate number of each kind of counter onto both the Buzzard-Wasp Colony and the target creature. If you target Buzzard-Wasp Colony with Hei Bai's last ability, it will receive counters from both abilities.

mainBoard.text:
Whenever Hei Bai enters or attacks, you may sacrifice another creature or artifact. If you do, put two +1/+1 counters on Hei Bai.
When Hei Bai leaves the battlefield, put its counters on target creature you control.

mainBoard.name: Koh, the Face Stealer

rulings.text: Activated abilities contain a colon. They're generally written "[Cost]: [Effect]." Some keyword abilities, like equip, are activated abilities and they have colons in their reminder text.

Players can respond to the triggered ability that exiles nontoken creatures that die. If the card leaves the graveyard before the ability resolves, Koh will not exile the card and it cannot be chosen with Koh's activated ability.

Triggered abilities use the word "when," "whenever," or "at." They're often written as "[Trigger condition], [effect]." Some keyword abilities, such as prowess, are triggered abilities and will have "when," "whenever," or "at" in their reminder text.

mainBoard.text:
When Koh enters, exile up to one other target creature.
Whenever another nontoken creature dies, you may exile it.
Pay 1 life: Choose a creature card exiled with Koh.
Koh has all activated and triggered abilities of the last chosen card.

Opfere eine Kreatur als zusätzliche Kosten, um diesen Zauberspruch zu wirken.
Bestimme eines oder beides -
* Bringe eine Kreaturenkarte deiner Wahl aus deinem Friedhof ins Spiel zurück, falls ihre Stärke kleiner oder gleich der Stärke der geopferten Kreatur ist.
* Zerstöre eine Kreatur deiner Wahl.

foreignData.name: 自暴自棄の嘆願
foreignData.text:
この呪文を唱えるための追加コストとして、クリーチャー１体を生け贄に捧げる。
以下から１つまたは両方を選ぶ。
・あなたの墓地にあるクリーチャー・カード１枚を対象とする。それのパワーがその生け贄に捧げられたクリーチャーのパワー以下であるなら、それを戦場に戻す。
・クリーチャー１体を対象とする。それを破壊する。

mainBoard.name: Desperate Plea

rulings.text: Because you select targets for Desperate Plea before paying its additional cost, the first mode cannot target and return the creature you sacrificed.

mainBoard.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Choose one or both —
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield if its power is less than or equal to the sacrificed creature's power.
• Destroy target creature.

foreignData.name: Maîtrise de l'Eau ruineuse
foreignData.text:
En tant que coût supplémentaire pour lancer ce sort, vous pouvez maîtriser l'Eau {4}. (Vous pouvez engager vos artefacts et vos créatures pour vous aider à payer un coût de maîtrise de l'Eau. Chaque permanent engagé ainsi paie {1}.)
Toutes les créatures gagnent -2/-2 jusqu'à la fin du tour. Si le coût supplémentaire de ce sort a été payé, à chaque fois qu'une créature meurt ce tour-ci, vous gagnez 1 point de vie.

foreignData.name: Verhängnisvolles Wasserbändigen
foreignData.text:
Als zusätzliche Kosten, um diesen Zauberspruch zu wirken, kannst du Wasserbändigen {4} durchführen. (Während du Wasserbändigen-Kosten bezahlst, kannst du deine Artefakte und Kreaturen tappen, um zu helfen. Jedes bzw. jede bezahlt für {1}.)
Alle Kreaturen erhalten -2/-2 bis zum Ende des Zuges. Falls die zusätzlichen Kosten dieses Zauberspruchs bezahlt wurden, gilt, immer wenn eine Kreatur in diesem Zug stirbt, erhältst du 1 Lebenspunkt dazu.

foreignData.name: Dominio dell'Acqua Rovinoso
foreignData.text:
Come costo addizionale per lanciare questa magia, puoi esercitare il dominio dell'acqua {4}. (Mentre paghi un costo di dominio dell'acqua, puoi TAPpare i tuoi artefatti e le tue creature per aiutarti. Ognuno di essi corrisponde al pagamento di {1}.)
Tutte le creature prendono -2/-2 fino alla fine del turno. Se è stato pagato il costo addizionale di questa magia, ogniqualvolta una creatura muore in questo turno, guadagni 1 punto vita.

foreignData.name: 滅びの水の技
foreignData.text:
この呪文を唱えるための追加コストとして、水の技{4}を行ってもよい。（あなたのアーティファクトやクリーチャーをタップすると、水の技コストを支払う助けとなる。１つにつきそれぞれ{1}を支払う。）
ターン終了時まで、すべてのクリーチャーは－２/－２の修整を受ける。この呪文の追加コストが支払われていたなら、このターンにクリーチャー１体が死亡するたび、１点のライフを得る。

foreignData.name: Control del agua funesto
foreignData.text:
Como coste adicional para lanzar este hechizo, puedes controlar el agua {4}. (Al pagar un coste de controlar el agua, puedes girar tus artefactos y criaturas para que te ayuden. Cada uno cuenta como un pago de {1}.)
Todas las criaturas obtienen -2/-2 hasta el final del turno. Si se pagó el coste adicional de este hechizo, siempre que una criatura muera este turno, ganas 1 vida.

mainBoard.name: Ruinous Waterbending
mainBoard.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may waterbend {4}. (While paying a waterbend cost, you can tap your artifacts and creatures to help. Each one pays for {1}.)
All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. If this spell's additional cost was paid, whenever a creature dies this turn, you gain 1 life.

mainBoard.flavorText: Mai didn't always care, but she never missed.

foreignData.flavorText: Mai se montrait souvent indifférente, mais ne ratait jamais sa cible.
foreignData.name: Précision mortelle
foreignData.text:
En tant que coût supplémentaire pour lancer ce sort, payez {4} ou sacrifiez un artefact ou une créature.
Détruisez une créature ciblée.

foreignData.flavorText: Mai war es nicht immer wichtig, aber sie traf immer.
foreignData.name: Tödliche Präzision
foreignData.text:
Bezahle {4} oder opfere ein Artefakt oder eine Kreatur als zusätzliche Kosten, um diesen Zauberspruch zu wirken.
Zerstöre eine Kreatur deiner Wahl.

foreignData.flavorText: Mai mostrava interesse di rado, ma non mancava mai il bersaglio.
foreignData.name: Precisione Letale
foreignData.text:
Come costo addizionale per lanciare questa magia, paga {4} o sacrifica un artefatto o una creatura.
Distruggi una creatura bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText: マイはいつだって気のない素振りだが、狙いを外したことは一度もない。
foreignData.name: 正確無比
foreignData.text:
この呪文を唱えるための追加コストとして、{4}を支払うか、アーティファクトやクリーチャーである１つを生け贄に捧げる。
クリーチャー１体を対象とする。それを破壊する。

foreignData.flavorText: Mai no siempre prestaba atención, pero nunca fallaba.
foreignData.name: Precisión mortal
foreignData.text:
Como coste adicional para lanzar este hechizo, paga {4} o sacrifica un artefacto o criatura.
Destruye la criatura objetivo.

mainBoard.name: Deadly Precision
mainBoard.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay {4} or sacrifice an artifact or creature.
Destroy target creature.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"In the Swamp, we see visions of people we've lost, people we've loved, folks we think are gone."
—Нuu

foreignData.flavorText:
« Dans le Marais, nous recevons des visions de ceux que nous avons perdus, de ceux que nous avons aimés, de ceux que nous croyons partis. »
-Huu
foreignData.name: Lande prospère
foreignData.text:
Ce terrain arrive engagé. Au moment où il arrive, choisissez une couleur autre que le noir.
{T} : Ajoutez {B} ou un mana de la couleur choisie.

foreignData.flavorText:
„Im Sumpf sehen wir Erscheinungen von Verstorbenen, geliebten Personen, jenen, die wir für immer verloren glaubten."
-Huu
foreignData.name: Gedeihendes Moor
foreignData.text:
Dieses Land kommt getappt ins Spiel. Sowie es ins Spiel kommt, bestimme eine Farbe außer Schwarz.
{T}: Erzeuge {B} oder ein Mana der bestimmten Farbe.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Nella palude riceviamo visioni di persone che abbiamo perso, persone che abbiamo amato e persone che crediamo non ci siano più."
-Huu
foreignData.name: Landa Florida
foreignData.text:
Questa terra entra TAPpata. Mentre entra, scegli un colore diverso dal nero.
{T}: Aggiungi {B} o un mana del colore scelto.

foreignData.flavorText:
「この沼地では失ってしまった人や愛した人たちの幻が見える。もう会えないと思っている人たちだ。」
――ヒュー
foreignData.name: 興隆する湿地帯
foreignData.text:
この土地はタップ状態で戦場に出る。これが戦場に出るに際し、黒でない色１色を選ぶ。
{T}：{B}か、その選ばれた色のマナ１点を加える。

foreignData.flavorText:
"En el pantano, vemos visiones de personas que hemos perdido, a las que hemos querido, personas que creemos desaparecidas".
-Huu
foreignData.name: Páramo floreciente
foreignData.text:
Esta tierra entra girada. En cuanto entre, elige un color que no sea negro.
{T}: Agrega {B} o un maná del color elegido.

mainBoard.name: Thriving Moor
mainBoard.text:
This land enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than black.
{T}: Add {B} or one mana of the chosen color.
